text: Andre Reynolds II (born May 2, 2001) is an American soccer player who plays for Chicago Fire in Major League Soccer. == Career == A product of the Chicago Fire Academy, in January 2019, Reynolds signed a professional contract with the senior club as its first homegrown player from Chicago and its second- youngest player ever. On July 23, 2019, Reynolds made his professional debut for Chicago playing 58 minutes in a 0–2 loss to Cruz Azul in the 2019 Leagues Cup quarterfinals. == References == == External links == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Chicago Fire FC players Category:Major League Soccer players Category:Soccer players from Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Chicago Category:United States men's youth international soccer players Category:American soccer players Category:Homegrown Players (MLS)
title: Andre Reynolds II
